campaigns.name: Shai-Hulud Wave 1
campaigns.description: Self-propagating npm worm using postinstall hooks; compromised 180+ packages with 2.6B+ weekly downloads

campaigns.name: Shai-Hulud Wave 2
campaigns.description: Second wave using preinstall hooks; 796 packages, 27K+ malicious repos, 14K+ secrets exposed
